original: The child is adopted with full right of inheritance.
translation: 这个被收养的孩子拥有完整的继承权。

original: Is informed of the murder attempt.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! is trying to revoke the title of §Y$TITLE$§!, which has resulted in an armed conflict with §Y$TARGET$§!
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!正试图收回§Y$TITLE$§!的头衔，这已导致与§Y$TARGET$§!的武装冲突

original: This seems fishy. I should notify the supposed 'plotter'.
translation: 这看起来有猫腻。我应该通知那位「阴谋」嫌疑人。

original: Howling at the moon all through the night.
$ACTOR$ and $RECIPIENT$ will be dragged into a feud
§Y$CLAN$§! can't already have a Blood Brother
Do not have a Blood Oath with §Y$CLAN$§!
I swear to you that we shall be bonded by blood as brothers!
translation: 我向你发誓，通过歃血为盟我们结为兄弟！

original: I do not accept your offer of blood oath.
translation: 我不接受你血誓的请求。

original: Must not be a blood brother

[From.GetBestName] and his people have hunted on our lands, stolen our sheep and kidnapped our women. This even though they know very well the boundaries between our clans! They truly are despicable and would betray us instantly if given the chance.
translation: [From.GetBestName]和他的民众在我们的土地上打猎，偷窃我们的羊只并绑架我们的女人。即使他很清楚与我们的部族间的领土划分！卑鄙，真卑鄙，如果有机会，他们一定会背叛我们。

original: Beware the [From.Clan.GetName]. They are without honor.
With the death of [From.GetBestName] our blood oath with his family and our obligation to his people vanishes together with his life.
translation: 随着[From.GetBestName]死去，我们和他家人的血誓，以及我们对于他民众的义务，也随着他的生命一同消失。

original: [From.GetFirstName] has spent his hard earned wealth on attracting and recruiting more soldiers for his mercenary band.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]花了他辛苦赚来的钱，去吸引招募更多的士兵进入他的佣兵团。
我希望是个良好的投资。

original: [From.GetFirstName] has spent his hard earned wealth on carousing with his men, wasting it on spirits and women
translation: [From.GetFirstName]将他辛苦赚来的钱花在了与部下的狂欢，烈酒和女人上

original: You have too many holdings in your personal demesne. As a nomad you can only have one holding without penalties. However you might want to keep the land yourself so you can pillage it...$LIST$
translation: 你的个人直辖领地里有太多地产。作为游牧，想要避免惩罚你只能有一个地产。然而，你可能想自己留下这些土地方便你掠夺……$LIST$

original: Has Titles that can be Revoked

Among the peoples of the steppe, Prestige alone determines the line of succession. Legitimate children and siblings of the current ruler are eligible, but, unlike other forms of succession, only adults of the right culture can inherit.
translation: 在草原的人民中，威望即可决定继承的顺序。合法的子女和当前统治者的兄弟姐妹都拥有资格。但是，不同于其他继承形式，只有正确文化的成年人能够继承。

original: This is the majority culture in this county.
translation: 这是此省份的主流文化。

original: This is the majority religion in this county.
translation: 这是此省份的主流宗教。

original: You can never directly create a Mercenary title
translation: 你不能直接创建佣兵头衔

original: You can never directly create a Holy Order title
translation: 你不能直接创建宗教骑士团头衔

original: §RThere is no valid Ambition for you to pick!§!
§RThere is no valid Focus for you to pick!§!
§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! will not consider offers from infidels
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can use this Casus Belli to seize all titles held by the savage, §Y$TARGET$§!, within the de jure §Y$TITLE$§!.
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!能够使用此宣战理由夺取§Y$TITLE$§!法理内野蛮的§Y$TARGET$§!的所有头衔。

original: Feuding clans can declare wars against each other to seize a single county.
translation: 世仇部族能对彼此宣战抢夺一块单独的省份。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! vassalizes non-nomadic lords and takes all other titles in the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!附庸非游牧领主，夺取§Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!内的其他所有头衔。\n

original: Pagans and Nomads can conquer single border counties without specific reasons. Norse Pagans can also take any coastal county.
translation: 原始宗教和游牧可以不用任何理由来征服单个边境省份。诺斯原始宗教还可以获得任意沿海省份。

original: Nomads can subjugate non-Nomadic realms once in their lifetime.
translation: 游牧一生中可以对非游牧领主发起一次征服。

original: If our population is getting too large, we may invade another realm to seize their pasture lands! If successful, all occupied territory will be seized and all vassals will become our vassals.
translation: 如果我们的人口太多，我们可以入侵任何领地以抢夺他们的牧场！如果成功，全部被占领的疆土都将被我们攫取，并且全部的封臣都将成为我们的封臣。

original: Send your [GetTreasurerName] to collect extra contributions from vassals and tributary rulers. This will not please them much...
translation: 派出你的[GetTreasurerName]去收集封臣和朝贡国统治者的额外的贡品。这不会让他们太高兴……

original: My liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has charged me with collecting extra tribute from [tribute_giver.GetTitledName]. It has not been easy going through [tribute_giver.GetPossPronoun] finances, but I finally know how much I should demand...
translation: 我的领主，[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]一直要求我从[tribute_giver.GetTitledName]收取额外的贡品。查清[tribute_giver.GetPossPronoun]财政并不容易，但我终于知道我应该索要多少……

original: The [GetRootFromInsult], [From.GetTitledFirstName], is here demanding extra 'contributions' on behalf of [From.Liege.GetTitledName]!
translation: 那个[GetRootFromInsult]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，在这里代表[From.Liege.GetTitledName]要求额外「贡赋」！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] wisely - though reluctantly - accepted my demand for extra contributions to my liege, [Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. I fear this has hurt our relations, however...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]明智——虽然不情愿地——接受了我的要求，为我的君主[Liege.GetTitledFirstName]上交额外的贡赋。然而，我担心这会伤害我们之间的关系……

original: My efficient [From.GetJobTitle], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has managed to squeeze some extra money out of [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. I fear [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] is not too happy about it though...
translation: 我高效的[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetTitledFirstName]已经设法从[FromFrom.GetTitledName]挤出了一些额外钱财。虽然我担心[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]对于这事不会太高兴……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] outrageously refused my demand for extra contributions to my liege, [Liege.GetTitledFirstName], claiming [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is under no such obligations!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]悍然拒绝为我的君主[Liege.GetTitledFirstName]付出额外贡赋的要求，称[From.GetSubjectPronoun]没有这样的义务！

original: The [GetRootFromFromInsult], [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], outrageously refused to pay the extra tribute demanded by my [Root.GetTreasurerName], [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 那个[GetRootFromFromInsult]，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]，悍然拒绝我的[Root.GetTreasurerName]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的要求交纳额外贡品！

original: Send your [GetMarshalName] to increase your manpower regrowth.
translation: 派出你的[GetMarshalName]增加你的人力恢复。

original: Send your [GetChancellorName] to improve your clan's esteem in the eyes of another clan.
translation: 派出你的[GetChancellorName]去提高你部族在另一个部族眼中的尊重。

original: Most of the Clan elders are assembled in [Root.Location.GetName]. This is a golden opportunity to tell them about the great honor of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s clan...
translation: 部族中大部分长者们都在[Root.Location.GetName]聚集起来。这是讲述[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]部族伟大荣耀的黄金时机……
讲给他们这样一个故事……

original: My trusted [Root.GetChancellorName], [From.GetTitledFirstName], reports success from the Clan of [target_chief.Clan.GetBaseName]. Their elders now like the [Root.Clan.GetName] a lot better!
translation: 我信任的[Root.GetChancellorName]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，从[target_chief.Clan.GetBaseName]部族汇报任务成功。现在他们的长者更喜欢[Root.Clan.GetName]了！

original: You can declare war to free yourself or one of your vassals from tributary status.
translation: 你可以发动战争使你或你的一名封臣摆脱朝贡地位。

original: Since §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is a Tribal barbarian, our vassals will not object.
translation: 因为§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!是个部落的野蛮人，我们的封臣将不会反对。

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can use this Casus Belli to seize all titles held by the infidel, §Y$TARGET$§!, within the de jure §Y$TITLE$§!. This Casus Belli is valid against neighbors, and also against infidels up to two sea zones away if either the attacker or the defender is a Muslim, or if the era of Great Holy Wars has started for the attacker's religion.
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以用这个宣战理由夺取异教徒§Y$TARGET$§!在§Y$TITLE$§!法理内的所有领地。此宣战理由针对邻国时有效，而如果攻击方或者防御方之一是穆斯林，或者攻击方宗教的大圣战时代已开启，则也能针对最多两个海区距离内的异教徒。

original: We have no units in enemy counties where we lack Holdings
translation: 在我们缺少地产的敌对省份我们没有部队单位

original: The vile excesses of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] can no longer be tolerated! We agree that [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] should be excommunicated!
translation: 不能继续容忍[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的卑劣行径了！我们一致同意[Root.GetSubjectPronoun]应被绝罚！

original: Have §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W excommunicated. This will cost you §R100§W Piety and will be viewed as an insult by [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPossPronoun] relatives.
translation: 令§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W被绝罚。将会花费你§R100§W虔诚并且会被[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPossPronoun]亲属视为侮辱。

original: Have §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W excommunicated. This will cost you §R$COST$§W Piety and will be viewed as an insult by [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPossPronoun] relatives.
translation: 令§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W被绝罚。将会花费你§R$COST$§W的虔诚并且会被[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetPossPronoun]亲戚视为侮辱。

original: Lift the excommunication of §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§W. This will cost you §R$COST$§W Piety.
translation: 免除§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§!的绝罚。这将会花费你§R$COST$§!虔诚。

original: You can only Designate your Children

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the adherents of '[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]' in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThe dark manifestations of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] must be cleansed in healing flames!
translation: 伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[New.GetTitledName]、以及在[From.GetFullBaseName]的「[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]」信徒们发动了[Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName]！以[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]之名，所有真正的[Root.Religion.GetName]人都被号召加入战争！\n\n[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的黑暗化身必须被治愈之焰清洗！

original: The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the followers of [New.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the old arch-enemy!\n\nMuhammed was the mouthpiece of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] and all his works must be destroyed!
translation: 伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[New.GetTitledName]、以及在[From.GetFullBaseName]的[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]追随者们发动了[Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName]！所有真正的[Root.Religion.GetName]人都被召唤加入战争对抗古老的大敌！\n\n穆罕默德是[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的喉舌，他的所有邪说都应该被清除！

original: The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the [New.Religion.GetName] infidels in [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the deniers of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThe Magi will cleanse their churches in healing flames!
translation: 伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[New.GetTitledName]和在[From.GetFullBaseName]的[New.Religion.GetName]异教徒发动了[Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName]！所有真正的[Root.Religion.GetName]都被召唤加入战争对抗不信仰[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的人！\n\n祭司将会用治愈之焰清洗他们的教堂！

original: The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the adherents of '[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]' in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThe idolators will learn to fear the Lord!
translation: 伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[New.GetTitledName]、以及在[From.GetFullBaseName]的「[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]」信徒们发动了[Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName]！以[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]之名，所有正义的[Root.Religion.GetName]人都被召唤加入战争！\n\n这些无知者将学会恐惧主！

original: The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the followers of [New.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! The whole [Root.Religion.GetName] nation is called to arms against the [New.Religion.GetName] menace!\n\nThe false works of the Madman must be torn down!
translation: 伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[New.GetTitledName]、以及在[From.GetFullBaseName]的[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]追随者们发动了[Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName]！整个[Root.Religion.GetName]之国都被召唤加入战争对抗[New.Religion.GetName]的威胁！\n\n疯子的邪说必须被粉碎！

original: The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the [New.Religion.GetGroupName] infidels in [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the old oppressors!\n\nThe Lord will prove us right!
translation: 伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[New.GetTitledName]和在[From.GetFullBaseName]的[New.Religion.GetGroupName]异教徒发动了[Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName]！所有真正的[Root.Religion.GetName]都被召唤加入战争对抗这些古老的迫害者！\n\n主会证明我们是正确的！

original: Temples provide moderate income and good levies. They may also give Piety to their holder, and the holder's liege.
translation: 神殿同时提供可观的收入和良好的征召兵。神殿也提供虔诚给其持有者，以及持有者的领主。

original: Arrange a betrothal with the most eligible potential spouse.
translation: 与最合适的潜在配偶安排订婚。

original: In Crusader Kings II, you play as a succession of medieval rulers from a single dynasty.\nThere is no set goal, but the world is filled with ambitious rivals... Secure more land to increase your power and protect your family.
translation: 在王国风云II中，您将扮演一系列来自同一家族的中世纪统治者。\n游戏中没有预定目标，但这个世界满是野心勃勃的竞争者……夺取更多的土地以增强你的力量并保护你的家族。

original: As a ruler, your first priority is to secure an heir. If you do not have a legitimate heir when your character dies, the game will end. Other pressing matters appear as Alerts along the top of the screen!
translation: 作为一个统治者，您的首要任务是确保有一位继承人。如果您扮演的角色去世时没有一个合法的继承人的话，游戏就将结束。其他需要您注意的事务都会以警告的形式出现在屏幕上方。

original: You cannot hold infinite amounts of land yourself. To expand, you will need to rely on vassal rulers. Keep them happy with titles and gifts lest they decide to revolt! The game will end in 1452, if your line can stay in power that long...
translation: 你不能亲自持有无限量的土地。想要扩张，你将需要依赖封臣统治者。使用头衔和礼物让他们开心，以免他们决定叛乱！游戏将在1452年结束，当然你的血脉也得能在那么长的时间内保住权力……

original: $NAME$ Bishops may pay tax to the Pope rather than their secular liege
translation: $NAME$的主教们向教宗而不是世俗领主交税

original: The $HEAD_TITLE$ can grant the Invasion Casus Belli
The $HEAD_TITLE$ can grant Claims on titles

translation: 神职人员（神殿领主）可以继承头衔

original: No opinion penalty against female rulers and heirs
translation: 对女性统治者与继承者没有好感惩罚

original: Fairly weak rulers can Prepare Invasions
translation: 比较弱小的统治者能够准备入侵
船队能够在大河上航行

original: Rulers can raid infidel neighbors for loot
translation: 统治者可以劫掠邻近的异教徒

original: Vassals do not mind if their levies are raised
translation: 动员封臣的征召兵不会降低好感

original: Rulers can marry close kin to improve vassal opinions
translation: 统治者可以嫁娶近亲来提升封臣好感

original: $NAME$ men can have up to §Y$NUM$§! wives (unless they are allowed to have concubines)
translation: $NAME$男性可以最多娶 §Y$NUM$§! 个妻子（除非被允许纳妾）

original: $NAME$ men can take up to §Y$NUM$§! Concubines
translation: $NAME$男性最多可以纳 §Y$NUM$§! 个侍妾

original: Non-pagans (with low tech) have a very low Supply Limit in $NAME$ counties
translation: 非原始宗教（低科技）在$NAME$的省份上只拥有很低的补给上限

original: Rulers lose Prestige if at peace for too long
translation: 和平时间太长，统治者会失去威望

original: A religious head (the $HEAD_TITLE$) can be created by a special Decision
translation: 一名宗教领袖（$HEAD_TITLE$）可通过特殊决议创建

original: $TITLE_NAME$ is held by a secular ruler, and can be destroyed or created normally
translation: $TITLE_NAME$由世俗统治者兼任，并且可以正常摧毁或创建

original: There is always a $HEAD_TITLE$, landed or not
translation: 无论是否拥有土地，$HEAD_TITLE$总会存在

original: There is (and can exist) no religious head
translation: 不存在（也无法产生）宗教领袖

original: Caste Traits have great effect on opinions
translation: 种姓特质对好感影响巨大

original:
Much lower chance of provincial revolts
§Y*§! Large bonuses to all vassal opinions
§Y*§! Rulers can hold larger Demesnes
§Y*§! Rulers cannot declare Holy Wars
translation:
大幅降低省份叛乱几率
§Y*§! 大幅提高所有封臣好感
§Y*§! 统治者能够直辖更多土地
§Y*§! 统治者不能发起圣战

original: Can designate any valid offspring as the heir
translation: 可以指定任何合法后代为继承人

original: §Y*§! Women may hold all councillor positions\n§Y*§! Women may lead armies
translation: §Y*§! 女性可以担任所有内阁职务\n§Y*§! 女性可以带领军队

original: Nomads are not very interested in owning Holdings, only in more grazing land for their sheep and horses. Gameplay centers around the Population of the tribe and the Manpower it provides. Empty Holdings slots in open terrain increases the maximum population. While Nomads can have normal vassals, they are mostly concerned with managing the other, few but powerful, major Clans of the tribe.
translation: 游牧对拥有地产不感兴趣，只喜欢更多的牧场养更多的羊和马。游玩围绕部落的人口及其提供的人力。开阔地形下的空地产格会增加最大人口。游牧也能拥有普通封臣，但他们更注重管理部落中强大的部族。

original: The leaders of regular republics are randomly chosen from among the citizenry. This kind of republic is not playable, since there is no dynastic persistence between the generations of rulers.
translation: 普通的共和国领袖从市民中随机抽选产生。这种共和国不能玩，因为每代统治者之间没有家族连续性。

original: Theocracies, like minor republics, are unplayable. Rulers are appointed or elected from among the ecclesiarchy, and there is no dynastic persistence between generations of rulers.
translation: 神权政体和次级共和国一样不能玩。统治者通过任命或从神职人员中选举产生，每代统治者之间没有家族连续性。

original: $NAME$ dynasties may grow Decadent if the religion also allows it
translation: 若宗教允许，$NAME$家族会逐渐腐化

original: Laws are changed by expending Piety, not by votes
translation: 花费虔诚改变法律，无需投票

original: Rulers can raid infidel neighbors for loot
translation: 统治者可以劫掠邻近的异教徒

original: Other vassals will not object to vassal retraction
translation: 其他封臣不会反对收回封臣

original: De Jure Law effects are ignored
Male rulers can take up to §Y$NUM$§! Concubines
translation: 男性统治者最多可以纳 §Y$NUM$§! 个侍妾

original: Rulers can raid infidel neighbors for loot
translation: 统治者可以劫掠邻近的异教徒
失明角色无法继承头衔

original: Powerful 'minor' clans can rise up in revolt, demanding a place among the major clans.
translation: 强大的「次级」部族会向上级部族发起反叛索取更多土地。

original: Will not join wars against spouse (§Y[GetTitledName]§!)!
translation: 不会加入针对配偶（§Y[GetTitledName]§!）的战争！

original: Nomadic Tribes are always dominated by a number of major Clans. Keeping the clan chiefs in line - and balancing their number and power - should be a priority for any Khan. Have too few Clans, and one is likely to emerge by force if necessary. Have too many Clans, and they will be unhappy about lack of grazing land.
translation: 游牧部落总是由数个主要部族掌控。掌控这些部族酋长——平衡他们的数量和实力——这是每位汗王都应该优先考虑的。若部族过少，新的部族会通过武力出现。若部族过多，他们会因缺乏牧场而不悦。

original: Each Clan has an opinion of every other Clan, called Clan Sentiments. The Clan chiefs must respect these sentiments, which is reflected in their normal Opinions of the other chiefs. Keep a careful eye on the Clan Sentiments to prevent internal strife before it happens.
translation: 每个部族会对其他部族有不同态度，称为部族观感。部族酋长必须重视这些观感，这将会体现在他们对其他酋长的态度。维持部族观感，将内乱扼杀在摇篮。

original: Clans are always semi-autonomous and must be called to war even against a rebellion by another Clan. Worse, each Clan (even the ruling one) can only be allied to one other Clan, by swearing a Blood Oath. It is also common for Clans to be feuding, which allows them to war with each other for land. Positive or negative treatment of one Clan will also affect the Sentiments of any feuding or Blood Brother clan, as appropriate...
translation: 部族总是保持半自治的状态，并且即使是另一部族叛乱也必须通过召唤才参与战争。更惨的是每个部族（即使是统治部族）只可以通过血誓与一个其他部族结盟。各部族之间之间的世仇很常见，令他们可以为了土地互相开战。视情况而定，对一个部族积极或消极的举动会对其世仇部族和血誓部族的观感产生影响……

original: The key to managing the Clans is to use the special actions available to you - 'Split Clan', 'Settle Feud', etc.
translation: 管理各部族的关键是执行你可用的特殊行为——「分裂部族」，「调解世仇」，等等。

original: León and Asturias are now one kingdom
translation: 莱昂与阿斯图里亚斯合并为一个王国
莱昂与阿斯图里亚斯合并

original: The Kingdoms of León and Asturias are to stay united forever, so there will be only one crown and one king ruling them forever.
translation: 莱昂王国与阿斯图里亚斯王国将永远合一，只有一个王冠，也只有一个国王永恒统治二者。
我加冕为卡斯提尔国王

original: After centuries of subjugation, Castille has grown in power and autonomy. The time has come to be recognized as an equal by the other rulers in our region!
translation: 历经数百年的征战，卡斯提尔已经迅速壮大并独立自主。是时候要求本地区其他统治者认同我为平等的一员！

original: After centuries of subjugation, Portugal has grown in power and autonomy. The time has come to be recognized as an equal by the other rulers in our region!
translation: 历经数百年的征战，葡萄牙已经迅速壮大并独立自主。是时候要求本地区其他统治者认同我为平等的一员！

original: The little County of Aragon, created by the Franks long ago, has become such a prestigious title that many almost considered it to have the prestige of a [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier]. Now let it be so!
translation: 小小的阿拉贡伯爵领，多年前由法兰克人创立，如今已成长为声名卓著的头衔，许多人都认为其差不多拥有与[From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier]相同的声威。那就让其成为现实吧！

original: A powerful minor Clan has risen up in [Root.GetName], led by their charismatic chieftain. They demand a place among the major clans!
translation: 一个强力的次级部族已经在[Root.GetName]崛起，由他们魅力非凡的首领带领。他们想要在主要部族中获取他们的位置！

original: We shall see who proves the stronger!
A powerful minor Clan has risen up in [From.GetName], led by their charismatic chieftain. They demand a place among the major clans!
translation: 一个强力的次级部族已经在[From.GetName]崛起，由他们魅力非凡的首领带领。他们想要在主要部族中获取他们的位置！

original: The minor Clan rising has gained more support in [Root.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing revolt!
translation: 次级部族叛乱在[Root.GetName]得到了更多支援，叛乱正在壮大！

original: The minor Clan rising has gained more support in [From.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing revolt!
translation: 次级部族叛乱在[Root.GetName]得到了更多支援，叛乱正在壮大！

original: This title was given to women in the families within the Mongolian nobility.
translation: 这个头衔赐予蒙古贵族世家中的妇女。

original: The Mongolian warriors used eagles to aid them while hunting. Being responsible for the training of these companions was a great honor.
translation: 蒙古战士狩猎时使用猎鹰。负责训练这些猎鹰是莫大的荣誉。

original: Word has reached us that an ambitious Khan from beyond the great mountains has set out to unite the clans of the great steppe. It is also said by men who read the stars that this Khan is destined to become the ruler of the world.
translation: 我们已得到消息，在遥远群山的彼方有位雄才大略的可汗正在统一大草原上的各个部族。占星师说这位可汗是天命的世界之主。

original: What could those equestrians hope to accomplish?
translation: 那些骑马的家伙能干成什么事？

original: That should be nothing to worry about.
No-one will rule over our people!
translation: 没人可以统治我们的子民！

original: A Mongolian ruler who manages to unite the clans of the Great Steppe may claim the title of Genghis Khan, Greatest of Khans. While unifying the people of the step is quite a challenge, fullfilling the prophecy of ultimately becoming the leader of the world may prove to be even harder.
translation: 统一大草原各部族的蒙古可汗可以自称成吉思汗，最伟大的可汗。但一统草原人民困难重重，要最终完成一统天下的预言更是难上加难。

original: A Mongolian ruler who manages to unite the clans of the Great Steppe may claim the title of Genghis Khan, Greatest of Khans. While unifying the people of the steppe is quite a challenge, fullfilling the prophecy of ultimately becoming the leader of the world may prove to be even harder.
translation: 统一大草原各部族的蒙古可汗可以自称成吉思汗，最伟大的可汗。但一统草原人民困难重重，要最终完成一统天下的预言更是难上加难。

original: The many Khans of the steppe have been rallied under the same banner. The leader that managed to unite them all is [From.GetFirstName] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. The people of the steppe now call their leader Genghis Khan, Greatest of Khans, and have set their minds not only on ruling the steppes but to spread throughout the world. Is there anyone who can stop the thundering armies of thousands of hooves?
translation: 草原上众多可汗已经统合在同一面旗帜之下。成功统合他们所有人的首领是[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[From.GetFirstName]。大草原的民众现在称呼他们的首领为成吉思汗，最伟大的可汗，并且他们不仅只着眼于草原更放眼于四海。是否有人能阻挡他们雷霆般军队的隆隆蹄声？

original: Something has to be done to stop them!
translation: 必须做什么去阻止他们！

original: [From.GetFirstName] truly is the Greatest of Khans!
I'll use this knowledge to my advantage!

More than a month has passed since you set out with your expedition, and you have yet to find a suitable trade partner anywhere. Your crew is homesick, and have now turned the company around to head home.
translation: 你出发远征冒险已一月有余，而你在任何地方都没有找到合适的贸易伙伴。你的手下思乡心切，现在已经转头带着团队回家了。

original: I should take the bird out for some hunting instead.
translation: 我应该带着鸟儿去打猎作为替代。

original: In the wrestling pit people fight for glory and enjoyment.
translation: 在摔跤坑中，人们为了荣誉与欢愉而奋战。

original: At the shrine people can practice the main religious rituals and ceremonies.
translation: 在神殿中，人们可以举行主要宗教仪式和庆典。

original: Wagons pulled by oxen are used to move villages and supplies. Yurts were commonly moved fully assembled to achieve a mobile community.
translation: 牛拉的车用来迁移村落和物资。蒙古包可以在完全组装的状态下整体迁移来实现移动的社区。

original: Sheep wool is used to make felt in addition to the meat that the sheep provide.
translation: 除了肉以外，羊还可以提供羊毛来制作毛毯。

original: Regular hunting activities are arranged in the region.
translation: 该地区定期举行狩猎活动。

original: A competition to bring forth the fastest riders.
translation: 一场角逐最快骑手的大赛。

original: Checkpoints for a fast messenger system giving supplies and fresh horses to allow messengers to travel huge distances every day.
translation: 快速信使系统中的检查站，提供补给和轮替的马匹从而使信使每天可以移动非常长的距离。

original: The most proven heroes of the realm gather to discuss everything from politics to tactics.
translation: 领地内最受认可的英雄们聚集起来讨论从政治到战术的一切事务。

original: The cattle livestock provides meat and works as pack animals.
translation: 牛作为牲畜能提供肉类并作为一种驮畜工作。

original: Dried meat work as effective field rations for the armies.
translation: 肉干对于军队是高效的战场口粮。

original: A harbor village allowing small transport and trade ships to dock and be maintained.
translation: 港口村庄允许小型运输船及贸易船只在此驻港、维护。

original: Fishers use the nearby water to provide an additional source of food.
translation: 渔民利用附近水域提供额外的食物源。

original: Turning the wool into felt for use in clothes or the construcion of tents.
translation: 将羊毛变成毛毡，用来制衣或搭建毡帐。

original: Crafted from bamboo, horn and sinew, small composite bows are agile enough to be used effectively on horseback.
translation: 以竹、兽角及皮筋制成的小复合弓足够灵活，在马背上可高效使用。

original: Rectangular leather pieces are laced together to form a sturdy armor.
translation: 方型革片以线串起制成一副坚实的护甲。

original: The majority of the residences in the steppe consists of felt huts known as gers.
translation: 草原上的居民大都住在毛毡制成的穹庐毡帐中。

original: The camel breeder makes sure that there is a steady supply of sturdy camels.
translation: 骆驼饲养员确保健壮骆驼的供应稳定。

original: These shrines gives the oppotunity for people to worship deities of different religions.
translation: 这些神龛用于给不同信仰的人们提供机会崇拜神灵。

original: A meeting place for the different clans in the nomad realm to discuss various internal affairs.
translation: 游牧领地中不同部族间讨论内部事宜的会议场所。

original: A mild alcoholic beverage derived from mare's milk.
translation: 阿日格是用马奶酿成的酒。

original: The local minting of coins allows more trade to be conducted in the county.
translation: 当地的铸币业使更多的贸易在这个省份进行。

original: Small barricades have been errected around the camp to protect it from bandits and raiders.
translation: 营地周围竖起了小型屏障，以防强盗入侵。

original: In the camp elephants are prepared to take part in military campaigns.
translation: 营中的大象随时准备加入军事战役。

original: Your vassal limit indicates how many direct vassals you can have at count tier or higher, excluding nomad clans. Having too many direct vassals will negatively affect the amount of taxes and levies you get from your vassals, and you might lose the grip of your vassals upon death.
translation: 你的封臣上限表示你可以拥有多少伯爵或以上级别的直属封臣，但游牧部族不计算在内。拥有太多直属封臣将会减少你从封臣获得的税收和征召兵，并且在你死时有可能失去一部分封臣。

original: You have become the ruler of a Nomadic realm and are therefore no longer allowed to continue playing.
translation: 你成为了游牧领地的统治者，因此不允许继续游戏。

original: All empty demesne counties will get a §YTribal holding§!\n
translation: 所有空白直辖领都会获得一个§Y部落地产§!\n

original: I can choose to settle my tribe permanently.
translation: 我可选择永久定居我的部落。
于[Root.GetName]定居并采用封建制度

original: [From.GetDynName] settled as a tribe in [From.GetHerHis] domains, leaving their old nomad life behind them.
translation: [From.GetDynName]作为部落定居于[From.GetHerHis]疆域中，抛弃了旧有的游牧生活。

original: [From.GetDynName] adopted an Iqta system in [From.GetHerHis] domains, abandoning the old tribal ways.
translation: [From.GetDynName]于[From.GetHerHis]疆域中采取了伊克塔制，抛弃了旧有的部落生活。

original: [From.GetDynName] adopted a feudal system in [From.GetHerHis] domains, leaving their old nomad life behind them.
translation: [From.GetDynName]于[From.GetHerHis]疆域中采取了封建制，抛弃了旧有的游牧生活。

original: [From.GetDynName] adopted an Iqta system in [From.GetHerHis] domains, leaving their old nomad life behind them.
translation: [From.GetDynName]于[From.GetHerHis]疆域中采取了伊克塔制，抛弃了旧有的游牧生活。
$FIRST_LOCATION$内的§Y$FIRST_TYPE$§!与$SECOND_LOCATION$内的§Y$SECOND_TYPE$§!之比值少于 §Y$VAL$§!（现有$FIRST_VAL$/$SECOND_VAL$§Y$FIRST_TYPE$§!）

original: At least §Y$VAL$§!% more §Y$FIRST_TYPE$s§! in $FIRST_LOCATION$ per §Y$SECOND_TYPE$s§! in $SECOND_LOCATION$ (currently $FIRST_VAL$/$SECOND_VAL$ §Y$FIRST_TYPE$s§!)
The King of the [FromFrom.Culture.GetName]s, [FromFrom.GetBestName], has decided to settle down in [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName], making it [FromFrom.GetHerHis] new tribal homeland.
translation: [FromFrom.Culture.GetName]们的王，[FromFrom.GetBestName]，决定在[FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]定居，成为[FromFrom.GetHerHis]新部落家园。

original: We've decided to offer you the position of commander, do you accept?
translation: 我们决定任命你为指挥官，是否接受？

original: We have decided to revoke your title as commander.
translation: 我们决定撤销你指挥官之职。

original: Has not adopted the faith of another clan in 10 years\n
translation: 10年内未改换其他部族的信仰\n

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! refused the absorption of the §Y[Recipient.Clan.GetName]§! clan, requested by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!拒绝了§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!提出的同化§Y[Recipient.Clan.GetName]§!部族一事。

original: This will lower §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s opinion of you by §R$VAL$§!.
[Recipient.GetHerHis] Blood Brother §Y$BLOOD_BROTHER$§!'s Clan Sentiment towards you will also be lowered by §R$VAL$§!.
translation: [Recipient.GetHerHis]结拜兄弟§Y$BLOOD_BROTHER$§!对你的部族观感亦将减少 §R$VAL$§!。

original: Other clan vassals will see this as a tyrannical act, decreasing their Sentiment towards you by §R$VAL$§!.
translation: 其他部族封臣将视之为暴君行为，减少他们对你的观感 §R$VAL$§!。

original: Other clan vassals will not mind, as they think there are too many clans in the realm.
translation: 其他部族封臣将毫不在意，因为他们觉得领地内部族太多了。

original: I humbly accept your decision to absorb the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan, though it grieves me deeply.
translation: 我虽然内心极为悲伤，但还是恭顺地接受您同化[From.GetOnlyDynastyName]部族的提议。

original: I will not allow you to steal my people without a fight! You are no longer my Khan.
translation: 我不会允许你兵不血刃就偷走我的人民！你不再是我的汗王。

original: §Y$TITLE$§! will no longer be an adventurer title.\n
§Y$TITLE$§! will no longer be a temporary title.\n
Resign from your duty as a Commander
translation: 辞去你作为指挥官的职责

original: To avoid injuries or in order to lead your own troops, it might be a good idea to Resign from your duty as a Commander.
translation: 为防受伤或为了领导自己的军队，辞去你作为指挥官的职责看起来是一个好主意。

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W has Resigned from [Actor.GetHerHis] duty as Commander.
I have decided to step down as your Commander.
translation: 我决定不再担任你手下的指挥官。

original: Clan Sentiment difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! lower than §Y$VAL$§!
translation: §Y$FIRST$§!以及§Y$SECOND$§!之间部族观感差异小于 §Y$VAL$§!

original: Clan Sentiment difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! at least §Y$VAL$§!
translation: §Y$FIRST$§!以及§Y$SECOND$§!之间部族观感差异至少 §Y$VAL$§!

original: The following Special Minor Titles can be granted:\n$LIST$
translation: 可授予以下特殊荣誉头衔：\n$LIST$

original: §YCommanders§! are the only ones after the §YMarshal§! and the ruler who are allowed to command armies.
translation: §Y指挥官§!是§Y军事总管§!和统治者之外唯独允许领兵的一群人。

original: [FromFrom.GetBestName], leader of the [FromFrom.Clan.GetName] Clan, has adopted our religion.
translation: [FromFrom.Clan.GetName]，[FromFrom.GetBestName]部族的领袖，已改换我们的宗教。

original: [FromFrom.GetBestName], leader of the [FromFrom.Clan.GetName] Clan, has adopted the faith of [From.GetFirstName] and become [From.Religion.GetName].
translation: [FromFrom.Clan.GetName]，[FromFrom.GetBestName]部族的领袖，已改换[From.GetFirstName]的宗教，成为了[From.Religion.GetName]信徒。

original: Upgrade the Fort of [Root.GetName] to a City
Upgrade the Fort of [Root.GetName] to a Castle
Upgrade the Fort of [Root.GetName] to a Temple
Upgrade the Fort of [Root.GetName] to a Tribal Holding
translation: 把[Root.GetName]的堡垒升级为部落地产

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W has Formed a Blood Oath with [Recipient.GetBestName].
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W refused to form a Blood Oath with [Actor.GetBestName].
I propose we form a Blood Oath to help each other throughout our lifespan.
translation: 我建议我们歃血为盟，一生守望相助。

original: Absorbed the Clan of my Blood Brother

translation: 和解世仇的请求被拒绝

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W refused to Settle the Feud with the [Actor.Clan.GetName].

[Actor.GetBestName] has sent a messenger bringing luxurious gifts in hopes that these extravagencies shall make me forget the conflict between the [Actor.Clan.GetName] and the [Recipient.Clan.GetName].
translation: [Actor.GetBestName]派人送来了奢华的礼物，希望这些奢靡使我忘记[Actor.Clan.GetName]和[Recipient.Clan.GetName]之间的冲突。

original: The feud has finally come to an end and our people can again know peace.
translation: 世仇终于和解了，我们的人民可以再一次拥有和平。

original: The [From.Clan.GetName] are stubborn and refuses to put our issues behind us.
translation: [From.Clan.GetName]非常顽固，拒绝让我们的事情过去。
领地内少于 §Y$VAL$§W 个$TIER$头衔。
领地内至少 §Y$VAL$§W 个$TIER$头衔。
领地内至少 §Y$VAL$§W 个头衔。

original: Splitting Clans is a good way to keep your Clan vassals weak. Creating too many Clans however will make them upset about the competition. The new Clan will appreciate the power given to them and be loyal to you, for a while..
translation: 分裂部族是一个让你的部族封臣保持虚弱的好方法。然而建立太多的部族也会使他们对竞争感到不安。新建立的氏族会感激你给予他们的权力并效忠于你，当然只是在一段时间内……

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! refused the splitting of the §Y[Recipient.Clan.GetName]§! clan, requested by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!拒绝了§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!提出的对§Y[Recipient.Clan.GetName]§!部族的分裂

original: Split the §Y[Recipient.Clan.GetName]§! and give §Y$TITLE$§! to a new Clan.
This will lower §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s Clan Sentiment of you by §R$VAL$§!.
[Recipient.GetHerHis] Blood Brother §Y$BLOOD_BROTHER$§!'s Clan Sentiment towards you will also be lowered by §R$VAL$§!.
translation: [Recipient.GetHerHis]结义兄弟§Y$BLOOD_BROTHER$§!对你的部族观感也会降低 §R$VAL$§!。

original: All clan vassals will become upset as there is already enough clans in the realm, decreasing their Sentiment towards you by §R$VAL$§!.
translation: 所有的部族封臣都会不满，因为领地内已经有够多的部族了，降低他们对你的观感 §R$VAL$§!。

original: Other clan vassals will not mind, as they do not think there are too many clans in the realm.
translation: 其他部族封臣并不会在意，因为他们认为领地内的部族并不算太多。

original: I humbly accept your decision to split my Clan, though it grieves me deeply.
translation: 我恭顺地接受你的决定，分拆我的部族，尽管这让我非常痛心。

original: I will not allow you to steal my people without a fight! You are no longer my Khan.
translation: 我绝不允许不经过战斗就抢走我的人民！你不再是我的汗王。

original: Can only be used against self or the most Populous Clan vassal
translation: 只能对自己或者人口最多的部族封臣使用

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must have a valid county without a capital settlement to take
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须有一个没有首府聚落的可用省份

original: You have §R$NUM$§!/§Y$MAX$§! Clans, giving you a Clan Sentiment penalty towards all Clan vassals.
translation: 你有 §R$NUM$§!/§Y$MAX$§! 个部族，导致你对所有部族封臣都有观感惩罚。

original: You hold too much land compared to the other Clans. Hand out §Y$NUM$§! counties or you might face revolts from the existing Clans as it negatively affects their §YClan Sentiment§! of you. You can also face a §YMinor Clan Rising§! revolt to seize its rightful position among the major Clans...
translation: 和其他部族比起来你的土地太多了。交出 §Y$NUM$§! 个省份，否则你可能面临现有部族的反叛，因为这已负面影响他们的§Y部族观感§!。你还可能面对一场§Y次级部族崛起§!叛乱，试图获取在主流部族中的正当地位……

original: I have decided to revoke the lands of [ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName] and give it to a new clan. Failure to hand it over peacefully will lead to war.
translation: 我已经决定收回[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]的土地并交给一个新部族。如果移交过程不能和平解决将导致一场战争。

original: I have decided to seize your lands and merge your clan with mine. Failure to hand over your lands peacefully will lead to war.
translation: 我已经决定夺取你的土地并将你的部族并入我的。如果移交过程不能和平解决将导致一场战争。

original: Capital is in a Steppe, Desert or Plains county
translation: 首都在一个草原、沙漠或平原省份

original: Capital is in a Mountains, Hills or Arctic county
translation: 首都在一个山地、丘陵或极地省份

original: This building is only active while
§Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! is not allowed to move the capital again in $MONTHS$ months - unless it's back to the traditional capital of [PrimaryTitle.GetName].
translation: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§!在 $MONTHS$ 个月内不允许再度迁都——除非是迁回[PrimaryTitle.GetName]的传统首都。

original: Are you sure you want to move your court to $PROVINCE$, making it your capital?
translation: 你确定要将宫廷迁移到$PROVINCE$，将其作为你的新首都吗？

original: $GOVERNMENT$ Rulers can only do this once in their lifetime.
translation: $GOVERNMENT$统治者在一生中只可做一次。

original: You will not be able to change capital again for $MONTHS$ months.
translation: 在 $MONTHS$ 个月内你无法再次迁都。

original: I can upgrade the Fort of [Root.County.GetBaseName] to a prosperous City.
translation: 我可以将[Root.County.GetBaseName]的要塞升级为一座繁荣的城市。

original: I can upgrade the Fort of [Root.County.GetBaseName] to a glorious Castle.
translation: 我可以将[Root.County.GetBaseName]的要塞升级为一座光荣的城堡。

original: I can upgrade the Fort of [Root.County.GetBaseName] to a holy Temple.
translation: 我可以将[Root.County.GetBaseName]的要塞升级为一座神圣的庙宇。

original: I can upgrade the Fort of [Root.County.GetBaseName] to a Tribal Holding.
translation: 我可以将[Root.County.GetBaseName]的要塞升级为一个部落地产。

original: Nomads can only move their Capital to counties with an empty primary holding slot.
translation: 游牧只能将他们的首都迁至主地产格为空的省份。

original: This Trade Zone is owned by the §Y$FAMILY$§! Family of §YThe $REPUBLIC$§!
translation: 这个贸易区的所有者是§Y$REPUBLIC$§!的§Y$FAMILY$§!家族

original: This Trade Zone is owned by §Y$HOLDING$§!
Spymaster - Scheme, build spy network, study technology.
translation: 间谍总管——策划阴谋、建立谍报网和学习科技。

original: Court Chaplain - Proselytize, research cultural tech, improve religious relations.
translation: 宫廷司祭——传播宗教、研究文化科技和提高宗教关系。

original: Advancements in your Capital Holding of $NAME$
Local knowledge of $TECH$ in $NAME$ increased to level §Y$LEVEL$§!
translation: $NAME$内对于$TECH$的当地知识增加到级别 §Y$LEVEL$§!

original: Local progress of $TECH$ advancement in $NAME$ increased to §Y$PROG$§!
translation: $NAME$内的$TECH$进步的当地进展增加到 §Y$PROG$§!

original: You can only move your Capital during peacetime.
Members desire §Y[From.GetBestName]§! as the new leader for the §Y[This.GetFullName]§!. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!
translation: 部族渴望§Y[From.GetBestName]§!成为§Y[This.GetFullName]§!的新首领。当足够强有力的时候，§Y[From.GetBestName]§!或许会向§Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!提出最后通牒

original:
You have shown yourself weak and I speak for all the clans when I say that it is time for you to hand over the bridle to someone more worthy.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你已经证明了你的软弱，我和所有部族都通过气了，现在是时候请你交出统治权给一位配得上的人。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: The weak Khan has agreed to our demands and have to surrender himself to us.
translation: 懦弱的汗王已经同意我们的要求，向我们投降。

original: A faction led by disgruntled Clan-Chiefs have ended without bloodshed as the previous Khan surrendered.
translation: 由不满的部族首领组成的派系，没有流血就解散了，因为前任汗王已向他们投降。

original: I surrender myself to you [Root.GetTitledName] and only beg of you to have mercy upon me and my house...
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]，我向你投降，只求你对我和我的家族开恩……

original: Your clan has served us well, you shall live for now...
translation: 你的部族对我们忠心耿耿，你暂时可以活着……

original: Cowards like you have no place among us!
translation: 像你这样的懦夫不可与我们为伍！

original: Because of their different way of governance, none of your Clans will object to the imprisonment of this outsider.
translation: 因为他们的政体与我们大相径庭，你的部族中不会有人反对把这个外人扔进大牢。

original: Because of their different way of governance, none of your Clans will object to the execution of this outsider.
translation: 因为他们的政体与我们大相径庭，你的部族中将不会有人反对把这个外人处以极刑。

original: Because of their different way of governance, none of your Clans will object to the exile of this outsider.
translation: 因为他们的政体与我们大相径庭，你的部族中将不会有人反对把这个外人驱逐。

original: Pillaging this land will result in buildings being destroyed!\n
translation: 劫掠这片土地将导致建筑被摧毁！\n

original: Since this ruler has a larger realm than us we can revoke some of their land with just cause.
translation: 由于这个统治者的领地比我们大，我们可以用公正的理由收回他们的部分土地。

original: Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] to step down from the throne and install you as the new khan. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
translation: 递交最后通牒给§Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!，要求[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]放弃汗位并由你来做新的汗王。如果[Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝服从，你的派系将发动叛乱。
